rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for ample natural light and views of the garden.
Modern kitchen integrated with an open concept layout adjacent to the dining area, featuring a ventilation system that complies with local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
Open dining space connected with the kitchen for social gatherings, designed to allow energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Spacious master bedroom with south-west facing windows, ensuring a restful environment in accordance with Vastu guidelines for sleep areas.
Comfortable secondary bedroom designed to maintain privacy and energy balance; ideally positioned on the east side to invite positivity.
Primary bathroom for master bedroom use with modern fixtures and moisture-resistant materials.
Additional guest bathroom near the dining area or secondary bedroom to provide convenience.
Dedicated home office space with natural lighting and minimal distractions; positioned in a north-east direction for productivity.
Comfortable living area and private bedroom for the staff, located towards the rear of the plot to maintain privacy and separation from main family spaces.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned in the north as per Vastu guidelines for prosperity, with secure access and aesthetic landscaping.
Large windows in the living room to provide ample natural light and ventilation.
Balcony door connecting kitchen with an external utility space for garden access and fresh air circulation.
